game.name: Adventure Wedding
game.description:
The biggest happiest moment is going to come in the life of this cute and beautiful girl. Yes, she has finally decided to marry with a man who is equally smart and intelligent as the girl is. Today her wedding party would be held at the nearby party hall. The girl has already planned to hold a memorable countryside wedding. Everything is ready except her wedding outfit as the girl has assigned this task to you. Would you help her out right away? Join Adventure Wedding game and be ready to help the girl to pick up a fantastic wedding look!

Start with giving your girl a light makeup in this brand new dressing game for girls! Give her a nice lipstick and make the needful changes to her eyes! Now find out a white color gown with some attractive work on the dress and match it with a matching jewelry and a pair of sandals! Explore all the options and do not forget to combine her dress with an awesome veil and a bouquet in her hands! Give a lovely flower hand band to the girl to make her look like a perfect wedding girl!

You would find out the dress, beauty product and other accessory options on the both sides of the screen. A white color gown with a huge flair at the bottom can help her shine like a real princess. Make sure to give your girl a suitable hairstyle that can be a final step of this cool html5 dress up game. We are happy to get you connected with some more popular titles from our huge category of girls games that can be played on multiple devices, no download required on atmegame.com.
